input_text.Prompt:
You will write a professional product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product title information.

Product title:
Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly

Product keywords:
Homelite/John Deere Trimmer Head Assembly
Fits John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers
Pre-wound trimmer spool
.095" diameter
input_text.Response A: Arnold Universal String Trimmer Head Assembly is compatible with most straight shaft gas trimmers. It features a pre-wound trimmer spool and a .095" diameter.
input_text.Response B: The Arnold .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is designed to fit John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers. It comes pre-wound with a trimmer spool.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Both responses are really bad product descriptions.
